results.content: Awesome introductory course. Very informative to get a better overall idea about mongodb and its functions. Highly recommended, especially compared to other introductory courses.
results.content_html: Awesome introductory course. Very informative to get a better overall idea about mongodb and its functions. Highly recommended, especially compared to other introductory courses.

results.content: The course was smooth and understandable but it only covers the very basic operations and it doesn't go deep enough. It barely touches the surface of Mangodb.
results.content_html: The course was smooth and understandable but it only covers the very basic operations and it doesn't go deep enough. It barely touches the surface of Mangodb.

results.content: I enjoyed this course. It can be completed in a relatively short amount of time and it gets right to the point with respect to performing CRUD operations on a MongoDB database. The instructor also introduces you to MongoChef - a GUI for MongoDB. You can go everything from the command line client as well as the GUI but the GUI appears to have some really nice extra features. The instructor also shows you how to take backups of your database. As I said, it's a very short and basic course but it gets right to the point to get you up and running quickly. It also hints at and gets you thinking about what kinds of things are possible with MongoDB.
results.content_html: I enjoyed this course. It can be completed in a relatively short amount of time and it gets right to the point with respect to performing CRUD operations on a MongoDB database. The instructor also introduces you to MongoChef - a GUI for MongoDB. You can go everything from the command line client as well as the GUI but the GUI appears to have some really nice extra features. The instructor also shows you how to take backups of your database. As I said, it's a very short and basic course but it gets right to the point to get you up and running quickly. It also hints at and gets you thinking about what kinds of things are possible with MongoDB.

results.content:
Great introductory course on MongoDB and how to interface with it through MongoChef and the CLI. The audio quality needs to be improved,  but other than this it was just what I was looking for.

I recommend this to those looking into NodeJS development
